concept.title: Glossary group topic
concept.shortdesc: Glossary group <glossgroup> topics may be used to contain multiple glossentry topics in a single collection file.

conbody.p: The glossgroup topic allows authors to include one or more glossentry topics in a single collection file rather than authoring each glossentry topic in a separate file. The glossgroup topic is a specialization of concept.
